title: Behavior of Inheritance
description: In this lab, you will explore inheritance behavior, super() function, and cooperative inheritance in Python.

meta.title: Mastering Inheritance Behavior in Python
meta.description: Explore the intricacies of inheritance in Python, including single inheritance, multiple inheritance, and the use of super().
meta.keywords: inheritance, single inheritance, super, python, multiple inheritance
